text.text_translated: An earthquake is when the ground shakes a lot. This shaking can break buildings and bridges. Luckily, bridges do not fall down very often, especially modern bridges. People now know how to build bridges in areas where the ground shakes. They build them on ground that is stronger and does not move so much.
